title: CineVerse Movie Streaming App Frontend Implementation

requirements.summary: Create splash screen with CineVerse branding that displays on app launch
acceptanceCriteria: Splash screen displays CineVerse branding
Screen transitions to home after brief delay
Uses dark cinematic theme

file_operations.description: Create splash screen component that displays the CineVerse logo from frontend/public/assets/generated/cineverse-logo.dim_512x512.png with dark cinematic background, includes auto-transition timer to home screen after 2-3 seconds
Add splash screen routing and state management to show SplashScreen component on initial load, then transition to home page after delay

requirements.summary: Build home screen trending movies carousel that auto-rotates through featured movies
acceptanceCriteria: Carousel displays trending movie banners
Auto-rotation with smooth transitions
Users can manually swipe between banners
Each banner shows movie poster and title

file_operations.description: Create auto-rotating carousel component for trending movies with manual swipe controls, smooth transitions, displays movie posters and titles, uses frontend/public/assets/generated/trending-banner-bg.dim_1200x400.png as background overlay, fetches trending movies from backend
Create home page component that includes TrendingCarousel at the top, CategorySections below, and other home features (Continue Watching, AI Recommendations), fetches movie data via backend interface
Add route for Home page and set as default landing page after splash screen

requirements.summary: Display movie category sections with horizontal scrollable cards for Action, Comedy, Kids, Bollywood, and Hollywood
acceptanceCriteria: Five category sections displayed on home screen
Each section has a category title
Horizontal scrollable list of movie cards per category
Movie cards show poster thumbnail and title

file_operations.description: Create reusable category section component with title and horizontal scrollable movie card list, uses generated movie posters (movie-action-1.dim_300x450.png, movie-comedy-1.dim_300x450.png, movie-kids-1.dim_300x450.png, movie-bollywood-1.dim_300x450.png, movie-hollywood-1.dim_300x450.png) as placeholders, filters movies by category prop
Create movie card component displaying poster thumbnail and title with rounded corners, smooth hover animations, links to movie detail page on click
Add five CategorySection components for Action, Comedy, Kids, Bollywood, and Hollywood categories, positioned below TrendingCarousel

requirements.summary: Create AI recommendation section that suggests movies based on user interests
acceptanceCriteria: Recommendation section appears on home screen
Section labeled as personalized or AI-powered recommendations
Displays recommended movie cards horizontally
Recommendations update based on user watch history or preferences

file_operations.description: Create AI recommendations section component with horizontal scrollable movie cards, labeled as personalized recommendations, filters movies based on user profile preferences from getCallerUserProfile(), uses MovieCard component for display
Add AIRecommendations component to home page below category sections, only visible when user is authenticated

requirements.summary: Build movie detail page displaying poster, trailer preview, rating, cast, description, and watch button
acceptanceCriteria: Detail page shows large movie poster
Trailer preview embedded with play controls
Rating displayed prominently
Cast members listed with names and roles
Movie description text shown
Watch button navigates to playback or adds to continue watching

file_operations.description: Create movie detail page component displaying large poster using ExternalBlob getDirectURL(), trailer preview player using ExternalBlob for video, rating stars/number, cast list, description text, watch button that adds movie to continue watching list, add to watchlist button, fetches movie data by ID from backend getAllMovies()
Add route for MovieDetail page with dynamic movie ID parameter

requirements.summary: Implement search bar with smart suggestions that appears when typing
acceptanceCriteria: Search bar accessible from navigation
Real-time suggestions appear as user types
Suggestions include movie titles and relevant matches
Clicking a suggestion navigates to movie detail page

file_operations.description: Create search bar component with real-time movie title suggestions using debounced input, filters movies from getAllMovies() based on title match, dropdown shows suggestions with movie posters, clicking suggestion navigates to MovieDetail page
Create navigation component with SearchBar embedded, includes links to Home, Categories, Watchlist, and Profile pages, mobile-optimized bottom navigation bar
Add Navigation component to main app layout, visible on all pages except splash screen

requirements.summary: Create watchlist feature to add and remove movies
acceptanceCriteria: Add to watchlist button on movie detail page
Watchlist accessible from profile or navigation
Displays all saved movies with posters
Users can remove movies from watchlist

file_operations.description: Create watchlist page component displaying saved movies using getWatchlist(), shows movie cards with posters in grid layout, includes remove button per movie calling removeFromWatchlist(), empty state when no movies saved, requires user authentication
Add watchlist toggle button that calls addToWatchlist() or removeFromWatchlist() based on current state, shows visual feedback when movie is in watchlist, requires user authentication
Add route for Watchlist page accessible from navigation

requirements.summary: Build Continue Watching section tracking partially watched movies for easy resume
acceptanceCriteria: Continue Watching section appears on home screen
Shows movies user has started but not finished
Each card displays progress indicator
Clicking resumes playback from last position

file_operations.description: Create Continue Watching section component with horizontal scrollable movie cards showing watch progress indicators, fetches movies from user profile preferences or local storage, clicking card navigates to MovieDetail page, only visible when user is authenticated
Add ContinueWatching component to home page positioned above category sections, only displayed when user has partially watched movies

requirements.summary: Create Kids Mode with colorful safe interface filtering child-appropriate content
acceptanceCriteria: Kids Mode toggle accessible from profile or settings
Interface uses bright, playful colors when active
Only displays age-appropriate content
Visual indicator shows Kids Mode is active

file_operations.description: Create Kids Mode toggle component that updates user profile isKidsMode flag via saveCallerUserProfile(), displays colorful indicator when active using frontend/public/assets/generated/kids-mode-banner.dim_1200x400.png as visual element
Create custom hook to manage Kids Mode state from user profile, provides isKidsMode boolean and toggle function, filters movie content based on Kids category when active
Apply Kids Mode filtering using useKidsMode hook, show only Kids category movies when active, apply bright playful color scheme override, display Kids Mode banner at top when active
Add KidsModeToggle component to profile page settings section

requirements.summary: Build user login and signup flows with authentication and profile creation
acceptanceCriteria: Signup form collects necessary user information
Login form authenticates existing users
Session persists after successful login
Error messages display for invalid credentials

file_operations.description: Use the authorization component to support Internet Identity authentication. Create login button component using useInternetIdentity hook, handles login/logout flow, clears query cache on logout, shows loading states. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Use the authorization component to support user profile setup. Create profile setup modal that appears on first login when getCallerUserProfile() returns null, collects user name and preferences, calls saveCallerUserProfile() to persist, prevents flash by checking isFetched flag. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Use the authorization component to support authentication state management. Create custom hook wrapping useInternetIdentity and user profile queries, provides isAuthenticated, userProfile, isLoading states, handles profile fetch with proper loading states to prevent modal flash. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add authentication check wrapper, show ProfileSetupModal when user has no profile, require authentication for watchlist and profile pages, use authorization component error handling for unauthorized access

requirements.summary: Create profile page displaying user information, preferences, and settings
acceptanceCriteria: Profile page shows user name and avatar
Settings options accessible
Kids Mode toggle available
Logout option present

file_operations.description: Create profile page component displaying user name from getCallerUserProfile(), avatar using frontend/public/assets/generated/user-avatar.dim_128x128.png as default, preferences list, Kids Mode toggle, logout button using LoginButton component, requires authentication
Add route for Profile page accessible from navigation, protected by authentication check

requirements.summary: Create categories page for browsing all movie categories
acceptanceCriteria: Dedicated categories page accessible from navigation
All movie categories displayed with visual cards or tiles
Clicking a category shows movies in that category

file_operations.description: Create categories page component displaying all five categories (Action, Comedy, Kids, Bollywood, Hollywood) as visual tiles with representative imagery from generated movie posters, clicking category tile navigates to category-specific view showing filtered movies using CategorySection component
Add route for Categories page accessible from navigation menu

requirements.summary: Implement navigation flow between all major pages
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation menu or bottom bar accessible from main screens
Users can navigate to all major sections
Back navigation works consistently
Smooth transitions between pages

file_operations.description: Ensure Navigation component includes links to all major pages: Home, Categories, Watchlist, Profile, with active state indicators, mobile-optimized bottom navigation layout, smooth transitions
Configure React Router with all page routes (Splash, Home, Categories, MovieDetail, Watchlist, Profile), ensure proper navigation flow with back button support and route transitions

requirements.summary: Apply dark cinematic UI theme with premium OTT styling and mobile-first layout
acceptanceCriteria: Dark color scheme with cinematic blacks and deep grays
Rounded corners on all cards and containers
Smooth transitions and micro-animations
Modern, readable typography throughout
Layout optimized for mobile portrait orientation
Touch targets sized appropriately for mobile
Fast loading with optimized images

file_operations.description: Apply dark cinematic color palette (blacks, deep grays, subtle highlights), set base typography with modern font stack, define smooth transition defaults, ensure mobile-first responsive scaling

Configure Tailwind theme with cinematic dark colors (background, foreground, accent), rounded corner utilities, animation presets for smooth micro-interactions, mobile-first breakpoints, touch-friendly spacing scale
Create layout wrapper component applying consistent dark cinematic styling, includes Navigation component, provides page container with proper mobile padding and max-width constraints
Wrap all page routes with Layout component to ensure consistent dark cinematic theme and navigation across all pages
